title: To the Americans and people around the globe

replies.msg:
Thanks for your due support to Hong Kong protesters！As Hong Kongers rooted in vein, we know clearly how an evil, tyrannising regime we are confronting to. Still, we hereby solemnly promise that we shall fight for human rights, freedom and democracy to our last breathe even in midst of darkness, in the name of all fellows that are inhumanly suffered, arrested and likely sacrificed.

May Glory Be To Hong Kong！
